column4: Can somebody help me with a networking problem? The thing is, I just did a fresh install of Ubuntu Edgy, ping works perfectly to any site, but when I enter it in Firefox, it just displays 'Waiting for connection' forever.

Kaja, try terminal window --> ping www.yahoo.com you should get something like PING www.yahoo-ht2.akadns.net (209.191.93.52) 56(84) bytes of data. and a series of pings below it, if not you need to fix your DNS addres in /etc/resolv.d
unop: I can ping everything with success, but the weird thing is that a site like Google does show up in my browser but Yahoo for example does not.
